hymn.title: The issue of the third fall of man

layout.singingstanza: The is -- sue of the third fall of man, The with -- draw -- ing of the Ho -- ly Spir -- it; The com -- ing flood to de -- stroy man -- kind, But No -- ah found grace in the eyes of Je -- ho -- vah: Lord, make me like No -- ah, Find -- ing grace ev -- ery day. Grace is God Him -- self en -- joyed by us Through our co -- op -- er -- a -- tion By call -- ing, "Oh Lord Je -- sus."

lyrics.stanza: The issue of the third fall of man, The withdrawing of the Holy Spirit; The coming flood to destroy mankind, But Noah found grace in the eyes of Jehovah: Lord, make me like Noah, Finding grace every day. Grace is God Himself enjoyed by us Through our cooperation By calling, "Oh Lord Jesus."
